description: Manage logicapp app deployment via source control.

commands.name: az logicapp deployment source config-zip
commands.summary: Perform deployment using the kudu zip push deployment for a logic app.
commands.syntax:
az logicapp deployment source config-zip --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --src
                                         [--build-remote {false, true}]
                                         [--slot]
                                         [--timeout]
examples:
az logicapp deployment source config-zip \
    -g myRG -n myLogicApp --subscription mySubscription \
    --src zipFilePathLocation
